ygData.subject: money shortage?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... about 100 plat in the bank which is probably as high as my bank ... What level are you Iggie?  If money is a concern, you can make pretty good loot money
ygData.messageBody:
>Heh.. so all I have to do is find a level 50 wizard or a high level druid
>who's willing to take the faction hit.. or pay 1000 plat.. LOL I have
about 100 plat in the bank which is probably as high as my bank
>account ever is.

What level are you Iggie? If money is a concern, you can make pretty good
loot money over in Cazic. You can get up to about 1-3pp off of the lizzies
there and they even drop fine steel weapons. If you're too lazy to stand
around auctioning FS weapons, they can usually be redeemed to NPC merchants
for around 2-3pp as well. It's not uncommon before for me to get upwards of
100pp a night there. Of course, the best situation is to group yourself
with a couple of folks playing their tweaked secondaries...they usually
don't care about loot and you can wrack up the dough. :)

I'm not too rich myself, but I can usually do enough each night to cover the
costs of all the reagents and spells I use. :)

*IF* rumours are true about the Oracle Robe becoming *no rent*, it would be
a good idea to buy a pre-patched Robe now before the market picks it up in
price. Otherwise, don't worry about it...there are better robes than the
Oracle Robe now to look forward to. I know a 50 Wizzie who volunteered to
wear only the FBR through level 50 only because he liked the color
better....he kicked arse anyway. =)

--Lim'Dul
38 HE Wiz Veeshan
<The Magistry>
